00010 void VerseTreeItem::add_child(boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> child, ItemType item_type)
00011 {
00012     if (child != NULL)
00013     {
00014         child->set_parent(this);
00015         child->m_child_index = static_cast<int>(m_children.size());
00016         child->m_item_type = item_type;
00017         m_children.push_back(child);
00018     }
00019 }
